text: Uavɨci 3.9-10 Mk 4.1, Lu 5.1-3 Jisasɨ haman iga nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨladɨ hunɨga cave micɨ lamalama saŋ abamalɨ. Vɨkɨla nudɨ micɨ ve mɨgudɨbu nudɨ lɨbɨnikɨlavɨmɨdɨ agasaŋ lɨca nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨladɨ hunɨga cave micɨ lamalama saŋ abamalɨ. Igavɨci kulaŋ iamɨgali akape sɨbam lɨci hunɨga hɨvɨ mɨgumɨgu saŋ abamalɨ.
